enWisdom: Jealousy is the worst of diseases
Rancour is the malady of hearts
For the jealous one, there is no cure
Jealousy is an ailment that cannot be cured

Wisdom: الْحَسَدُ دَاءٌ عَيَاءٌ لَا يَزُولُ إِلَّا بِهَلْكِ الْحَاسِدِ أَوْ مَوْتِ الْمَحْسُودِ
enWisdom: Jealousy is an incurable disease, it does not end except by the destruction of the envier or the death of the envied
There is no malady like jealousy
